name: Learning Path: Data-Informed Design Examples

# Learning Path: Data-Informed Design Examples

## User Research Fundamentals for Designers, by Christine Perfetti 
To download example files from this video course, click [here](http://examples.oreilly.com/0636920040651/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
